title: Camera not Unlocking when clicking on mini map
body: Hi, So IV played this game for years and I constantly lock and unlock camera repeatedly mid game. Im disabled and Iv found te perfect way to use the camera. But I just came back form a break and normally when i click on minimap It auto unlocks camera and now all of a sudden its not doing that and I dont see a option to reactivate it plz look into this and fix it it asap.

replies.body: Have you tried the default camera lock/unlock keybinding? It should be the **Y** key for you, unless you made any customizations to those options.

What you are referring to is its normal function. It snaps back to your champion when you hit spacebar. Since you just came back from a break I would check out your keybindings and make sure they are updated.

YEs im set it to spacebar. I use it often what im telling you is that everytime i click on minimap to see somewhre else if my camera is locked it pans back to my character instantly. And this has never been  a thing before. I took a 4 month break so this had to be a relatively recent change. Its really screwed me over as its a big help /habbit. Pre whatever change riot made if I clicked somewhere on amp it would show where on map it is and auto unlock camera til i lock it again to pan back to my champion.
